entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
